title: United Airlines Bets on Return of Trans-Atlantic Travel
sub_head: Some airlines say they expect international travel to rise as restrictions start to ease
body:
United Airlines Holdings Inc. said it is planning a major trans-Atlantic expansion next year as it looks to take advantage of what it predicts will be a rapid rebound in international travel.
Airlines including United are betting that people will be anxious to travel abroad next year after countries closed their borders during the coronavirus pandemic and put in place a complex patchwork of rules and restrictions that are only just starting to ease.
